description: This file provides functions related to timer descriptor creation within the ANSC (Advanced Networking Service Container) framework. It mainly implements the function AnscCreateTimerDescriptor which creates and returns a new timer descriptor object, with conditional variations based on profiling macros.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateTimerDescriptor(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new timer descriptor object, potentially using a profiling variant based on compile-time macros.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateTimerDescriptor2(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved,char * file,int line)
methods.description: Creates a new timer descriptor object with additional profiling information, used when profiling macros are enabled.
